xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="K5=O#TA!wR?{56![eDeE" x="313" y="63">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="j6t.?moJl7iJuEom?r@(">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="gT^V_X1qfIvnZ]ro1Y)y">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id=";F(SoPCfO}-:0e;S#0}x">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="iFoD|7Y{4lmrpO%}6,nT">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="CpW-`ygJb,%Y}W,/9(xu">
                    <field name="TEXT">paige</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="radio_channel_get" id="3)pFm3Cz1T^vpe~]fm,c">
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                    <value name="name_">
                      <block type="text" id="}xBpyhcBn|flhO:+:FaD">
                        <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="cU9oWB#/NEBp1jj}eMz,">
                        <field name="type_">1</field>
                        <field name="speed_">2</field>
                        <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                        <value name="str_">
                          <block type="radio_channel_value" id="?f9~X=F%,rPCnHH)K1^Z"></block>
                        </value>
                        <value name="color_">
                          <block type="colour_picker" id="pZ[=]UFqp}F!L@6~[6UF">
                            <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                        <next>
                          <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="qI=#J9!o0B:v`o2mz:,A">
                            <field name="music_">m1</field>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="bit_button_event" id="?r^yD:X|hnS,Vudk}TJ=">
                <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_off" id=".nO-G.XDzjequM,%/CV7"></block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="delay" id=",A5D4A(z(Bzo0{mt^R3J">
                    <value name="secs_">
                      <block type="math_number" id="~hi!qGer0r5+m]MCyOfI">
                        <field name="NUM">2</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>

        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
